src:
Krka pobedila Zvezdu, pa dobila četiri šamara
Helios odneo tek drugi trijumf u Novom Mestu u istoriji

04 Nov 2019

Neočekivano loše igra Krka u poslednje vreme. Umesto da nakon pobede nad Crvenom zvezdom dobije dodatnu energiju i motivaciju da krene u još bolju rezultatsku seriju, tim iz Novog Mesta kao da je potpuno potonuo i potrošio svu snagu, pa je vezao četvrti poraz u nizu. Nakon neuspeha protiv Budućnosti i Primorske u ABA ligi, te Hopsi Polžele u domaćem šampionatu, danas je do iznenađujuće pobede u „Leonu Štuklju“ došao i Helios iz Domžala - 66:73.
Može se reći da je utakmicu rešilo užasno šutersko veče Krke iz reketa. Jednostavno tim iz Novog Mesta je završio meč sa katastrofalnim procentima i na šutu za dva i na šutu za tri poena, koji su se kretali oko 30%.
Iako je na poluvremenu ekipa iz Novog Mesta vodila sa sasvim solidnih osam poena razlike, potpuni krah desio se u trećoj deonici u kojoj je Krka dala samo šest poena, a primila čak 20. Četvrti kvartal doneo je ujednačenu igru na obe strane, pa sastav iz „Leona Štuklja“ nije uspeo da dođe do preokreta i pobede.
Novu sjajnu partiju pružio je Blaž Mahkovič, koji je postigao čak 21 poen uz šest skokova za Helios, dok je kod domaćih najbolji bio Luka Lapornik koji je uspeo da ubaci 20 poena. Međutim, to nije bilo dovoljno da se savlada veoma čvrsta ekipa iz Domžala.

SLOVENIJA 1 - 6. KOLO

PonedeljakKrka - Helios Domžale 66:73
Sreda18.00: Primorska - Šenčur
Subota18.00: Podčetrtek - Tajfun Šentjur19.00: Laško - Rogaška




Foto: 
ABA liga (Krka / Drago Perko)
text:
Krka defeated Star and got four slaps
Helios took only the second triumph in Novo Mesto in history

04 Nov 2019

Krka has been playing unexpectedly poorly lately. Instead of gaining additional energy and motivation to move on to a better result after winning the Red Star, the team from Novo Mesto seemed to have completely sunk and consumed all their strength, tying their fourth straight defeat. After failing against Buda and Primorska in the ABA league and Hopsi Polzela in the domestic championship, today Helios from Domzale also came to a surprising victory in Leon Stuklje - 66:73.
It can be said that the match was resolved by Krka's awful racquetball shooting night. Simply the team from Novo Mesto finished the match with catastrophic percentages on both the shot for two and the shot for three points, which were about 30%.
Although at halftime the team from Novo Mesto led by a solid eight points difference, complete breakdown occurred in the third section in which Krka gave only six points and received as many as 20. The fourth quarter brought a uniform play on both sides, so the team from "Leona Stuklja" failed to turn and win.
Blaz Mahkovich, who scored 21 points with six rebounds for Helios, provided another great game, while Luka Lapornik was the best in the home team and managed to score 20 points. However, that was not enough to overcome a very solid team from Domzale.

SLOVENIA 1 - 6TH ROUND

Monday Krka - Helios Domzale 66:73
Wednesday18.00: Primorska - Sencur
Saturday18.00: Podčetrtek - Typhoon Šentjur19.00: Laško - Rogaška

ABA League (Krka / Drago Perko)
